messages.subject: Need medical advise
messages.msgSnippet: I would suggest Nancy postponing fever reducing meds for at least 24 hrs. to see what symptoms manifest. A luke warm bath can help naturally reduce fever.
messages.messageBody: I would suggest Nancy postponing fever reducing meds for at least 24 hrs. to see what symptoms manifest. A luke warm bath can help naturally reduce fever.

messages.subject: Re: Need medical advise
messages.msgSnippet: or a cool rag just on his head (if he doesn t want a bath) to keep his head cool  it s ok to let his body work abit also sleep, water and lots of holding, that
messages.messageBody:
or a cool rag just on his head (if he doesn't want a bath) to keep his head cool it's ok to let his body work abit also sleep, water and lots of holding,
that what we've always done.
-susan
